data.eml:eml: Aspilotaisfahanensis, a new species of the genus Aspilota Foerster, 1863 from Iran (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Alysiinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Peris-Felipo, Francisco Javier, Yari, Zahra, Rakhshani, Ehsan, Belokobylskij, Sergey A. (2016): Aspilotaisfahanensis, a new species of the genus Aspilota Foerster, 1863 from Iran (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Alysiinae). ZooKeys 582: 121-127, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.582.7426, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.582.7426
